message.content:
cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CR 

The paper addresses the task of video-based person re-identification, which is a computer vision problem. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also introduces the use of 3D CNNs, which falls under the category of multimedia (cs.MM). The paper proposes a learned clip similarity aggregation function, which involves machine learning techniques (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the effectiveness of their method compared to previous works, which involves performance evaluation (cs.AI). Finally, the paper addresses the issue of filtering out hard clip pairs, which involves some level of security and privacy (cs.CR).
